DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare 30-day complication rate associate promontofixation pelvic organ prolapse perform via robot-assisted laparoscopic technique versus non-robot-assisted laparoscopic technique . Secondary objective include compare technical data , anatomical correction , prolapse recurrence , incontinence , quality life medico-economic data two technique .
DOC.brief_title: Complications Associated With Promontofixation Pelvic Organ Prolapse : Comparing Robot Assisted Laparoscopic Non-robot Assisted Laparoscopic Surgical Procedures
